Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Riu Palace Tenerife in Adeje (Costa Adeje), you'll be convenient to Del Duque Beach and Bobo Beach. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Golf Costa Adeje and Gran Sur Shopping Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 296 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have bidets and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Dip into one of the 3 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities including a sauna and a fitness center. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and a hair salon.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. Relax with a refreshing drink at a beach bar, a poolside bar, or one of 2 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. Relax with a refreshing drink at a beach bar, a poolside bar, or one of 2 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Riu Palace Tenerife in Adeje (Costa Adeje), you'll be convenient to Del Duque Beach and Bobo Beach. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Golf Costa Adeje and Gran Sur Shopping Center.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Del Duque Beach - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Bobo Beach - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Golf Costa Adeje - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Gran Sur Shopping Center - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Puerto Colon - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Aqualand Costa Adeje - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Torviscas Beach - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Siam Park - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Troya Beach - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Magma Art and Congress Centre - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Veronicas Strip - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Golf Las Americas - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Arona Pyramid - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Las Vistas Beach - 4.9 km / 3.1 mi
Los Cristianos Beach - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Riu Palace Tenerife is Tenerife (TFS-Tenerife South) - 17.4 km / 10.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
